page.title: 12POTTEN END-THE GREEN II.
page.content:
WITHIN THE VILLAGE GREEN IS A POND WHICH UP UNTIL THE MID 1960'S,WAS A VERY GOOD FISHING PLACE FOR ANGLERS. THE MAIN SPECIES WITHIN THE POND WERE RUDD AND DIFFERENT TYPES OF NEWTS. DURING THIS PERIOD THE POND BECAME POLLUTED FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS,BECAUSE IT IS A STILL POND AND THEREFORE THE SUPPLY OF WATER IS THE RAIN AND THERE IS NO FLOW OF WATER TO CLEAN THE POND.
OVER A NUMBER OF YEARS POLLUTION OCCURED BECAUSE PEOPLE NOT EDUCATED IN THE WAY OF THE COUNTRYSIDE BEGAN TO DUMP ALL FORMS OF RUBBISH INTO THE POND,FOR EXAMPLE HOUSEHOLD RUBBISH.
THE POND IS CLEARED BY FIREMEN NOW, BY PUMPING THE DIRTY WATER OUT OF THE POND AND REPLACING IT WITH CLEAN WATER ONCE IT IS EMPTY.
